alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greater Greenville; Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Laurens, southern Greenville, northeastern Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Greenwood, or near Ware Shoals, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Ware Shoals, Gray Court, Cokesbury, Hodges, Shoals Junction, Donalds, Fork Shoals, Princeton and Hickory Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
